name: Colorful Tanks
description:
In this game you will be playing as a tank. Your objective is to eliminate any hostile tanks. But remember that whenever you shoot - your enemies will shoot too. Moreover you can easily hit yourself with your own bullets or destroy your tank with a bomb or by driving on your own mines. So basically you're your own enemy, perhaps even more dangerous than your actual enemies. Instructions on how to play are available in-game.

Made for MiniJam in 3 days.
